00025 #include <fstream>
00026 #include <iostream>
00027 #include <string>
00028 
00029 #include "SystemCharacteristics.h"
00030 
00039 void 
00040 CreateAHFParameterFile( unsigned isnap ){
00041   std::cout<<" * Creating AHFstep parameter file...";
00042   std::ofstream fout;
00043   fout.open ( (Folder("output") + "parameters_AHF.txt").c_str(), std::ios_base::out );
00044   fout << std::endl
00045        << Folder("snaps") << Snaps(isnap) << std::endl
00046        << "ahf_out_" << std::endl
00047        << "16"<<std::endl
00048        << "4" <<std::endl
00049        << "5" <<std::endl
00050        << "0" <<std::endl
00051        << "0" <<std::endl
00052        << "0" <<std::endl
00053        << "0" <<std::endl;
00054   fout.close();
00055   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00056 }
00057 
00065 void 
00066 RunAHFstep( void ){
00067   std::cout << " * Running AHFstep..." << std::endl << std::flush;
00068   std::string now = "";
00069   now = "AHFstep < " + Folder("output") + "parameters_AHF.txt";
00070   RunCommand(now);
00071   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00072   //std::cin.get(); //wait for input
00073 }
00074 
00083 void 
00084 MoveAHFout(unsigned isnap){
00085   std::cout << " * Moving output files...";
00086   std::string now;
00087   std::string ahfout = Folder( "output" ) + Snaps(isnap) + "/";
00088   now = "mkdir -p " + ahfout;
00089   RunCommand(now);
00090   now = "mv ahf_out_* " + ahfout;
00091   RunCommand(now);
00092   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00093 }
00094 
00103 void 
00104 RenameAHFout(unsigned isnap){
00105   std::cout << " * Renaming output files...";
00106   std::string now = "";
00107   std::string ahfout = Folder( "output" ) + Snaps(isnap) + "/";
00108 
00109   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*particles " + ahfout + "ahf_out_particles";
00110   RunCommand(now);
00111   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*halos " + ahfout  + "ahf_out_halos";
00112   RunCommand(now);
00113   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*mass " + ahfout + "ahf_out_mass";
00114   RunCommand(now);
00115   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*profiles " + ahfout + "ahf_out_profiles";
00116   RunCommand(now);
00117   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*substructure " + ahfout + "ahf_out_substructure";
00118   RunCommand(now);
00119   now = "mv " + ahfout + "ahf*centres " + ahfout + "ahf_out_centres";
00120   RunCommand(now);
00121 
00122   std::cout << "done!" << std::endl;
00123 }
00124 
00136 void 
00137 AHFrun( unsigned isnap ){
00138 
00139   CreateAHFParameterFile(isnap);
00140 
00141   RunAHFstep();
00142 
00143   MoveAHFout(isnap);
00144   RenameAHFout(isnap);
00145 }
